title: Why The Protests Look so Religious
description:
We look at why the George Floyd protests used so much religious imagery.  From kneeling and chanting to contrition and acts of communion, the protests used catharsis as a means to a form of religious ecstasy, which was made more intense because of the Covid-19 lockdown.   We even look at the trope of Human Sacrifice appearing in the narrative.  

Support this channel: 
https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

The outro to my videos was written by Matthew Wilkinson

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
